recipe.title: Chicory and Endive Salad with Spicy Butter-Toasted Walnuts
ingredients: 4 cups chopped chicory (curly endive; about 1/2 head)
instructions: In a small skillet toast walnuts in butter over moderate heat until golden and sprinkle with cayenne and salt to taste. Cool nuts slightly. Cut endive crosswise into thin slices and in a bowl toss with chicory, nuts, lemon juice, oil, and salt and pepper to taste.
